#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>

using namespace std;

typedef pair<int,int> xy;
vector<xy> a;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
      int n;
       a.clear();
      scanf("%d",&n);
      int s,f;
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
      {  
        scanf("%d %d",&s,&f);
        a.push_back(pair<int,int>(f,s));
      }
      sort(a.begin(),a.end());
      int ans=1; int x=a[0].first;
      for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
      {
        if(x<=a[i].second) { ans++; x=a[i].first; }
      }
       printf("%d\n",ans); 
    }
 return 0;
}
